pullrequest.title: Remove reference to Jose's protobuf formula, but install dependencies twice

content.raw:
I posted an issue on homebrew, and [got a quick response](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew/issues/29841) that our formula is kind of broken because it depends on two different versions of the protobuf formula:

* osrf/simulation/protobuf
* protobuf via protobuf-c

We could probably avoid the issue by duplicating protobuf-c as well. Kind of a hassle, but I'm not sure what the other option is.
content.html:
I posted an issue on homebrew, and got a quick response that our formula is kind of broken because it depends on two different versions of the protobuf formula:

  • osrf/simulation/protobuf
  • protobuf via protobuf-c

We could probably avoid the issue by duplicating protobuf-c as well. Kind of a hassle, but I'm not sure what the other option is.
